mission.name: Update CV Flow
mission.description: Test the complete 'Refresh My CV' workflow including upload, processing, and download
mission.mission: Test the Update CV flow: Navigate to localhost:3000, click 'Refresh My CV' button to switch modes, upload a CV file by clicking the upload area, enter update notes 'Promoted to Senior Engineer in December 2024. Led team of 5 developers. Reduced API latency by 40% through optimization', click 'Refresh This CV' button, handle authentication by choosing 'Continue as Guest', wait for processing to complete, navigate to 'My CVs' page by clicking the 'My CVs' button in the header, find the newest CV card, click to preview it, and download the CV file
mission.expectedOutcome: CV is successfully updated, processed, appears in My CVs page, can be previewed and downloaded

validationRules.description: Mode toggle buttons should be visible
Update notes textarea should be visible
Refresh This CV button should be visible
Should navigate to My CVs page
CV card should be visible in My CVs

testData.updateNotes: Promoted to Senior Engineer in December 2024. Led team of 5 developers. Reduced API latency by 40% through optimization. Added new skills: TypeScript, Next.js, System Design.

steps.intent: switching to refresh mode to update the CV
uploading the CV file to update it
entering update notes for the CV
